info.title: LoadTest Client
info.description: LoadTest client provides access to LoadTest Resource and it's status operations.

get.description: Lists all the available API operations for Load Test Resource.

default.description: Resource provider error response about the failure.

get.description: Lists all the available quota per region per subscription.

default.description: Resource provider error response about the failure.

get.description: Get the available quota for a quota bucket per region per subscription.

default.description: Resource provider error response about the failure.

post.description: Check Quota Availability on quota bucket per region per subscription.

default.description: Resource provider error response about the failure.

get.description: Lists loadtests resources in a subscription.

default.description: Resource provider error response about the failure.

get.description: Lists loadtest resources in a resource group.

200.description: OK -- list of loadtests resources retrieved

default.description: Resource provider error response about the failure.

get.description: Lists the endpoints that agents may call as part of load testing.

200.description: The operation was successful. The response contains a list of outbound network dependency endpoints.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
An unexpected error response.

post.description: Set the limit of max monthly virtual user hours for the load testing resource.

default.description: An unexpected error response.

value.description: List of resources in current page.

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

identity.description: The type of identity used for the resource.
The type of identity used for the resource.

EncryptionProperties.description: Key and identity details for Customer Managed Key encryption of load test resource

identity.description: All identity configuration for Customer-managed key settings defining which identity should be used to auth to Key Vault.

type.description: Managed identity type to use for accessing encryption key Url

resourceId.description: user assigned identity to use for accessing key encryption key Url. Ex: /subscriptions/fa5fc227-a624-475e-b696-cdd604c735bc/resourceGroups/<resource group>/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/myId

keyUrl.description: key encryption key Url, versioned. Ex: https://contosovault.vault.azure.net/keys/contosokek/562a4bb76b524a1493a6afe8e536ee78 or https://contosovault.vault.azure.net/keys/contosokek.

QuotaResourceList.description: List of quota bucket objects. It contains a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of quota bucket objects provided by the loadtestservice.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of quota bucket objects results (if there are any).

limit.description: Current quota limit of the quota bucket.

usage.description: Current quota usage of the quota bucket.

isAvailable.description: True/False indicating whether the quota request be granted based on availability.

availabilityStatus.description: Message indicating additional details to add to quota support request.

QuotaBucketRequest.description: Request object of new quota for a quota bucket.

currentUsage.description: Current quota usage of the quota bucket.

currentQuota.description: Current quota limit of the quota bucket.

newQuota.description: New quota limit of the quota bucket.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription Id dimension for new quota request of the quota bucket.

location.description: Location dimension for new quota request of the quota bucket.

value.description: The collection of outbound network dependency endpoints returned by the listing operation.

OutboundEnvironmentEndpointCollection.description: Values returned by the List operation.

category.description: The type of service that Azure Load Testing connects to.

endpoints.description: The endpoints for this service to which the Batch service makes outbound calls.

OutboundEnvironmentEndpoint.description: A collection of related endpoints from the same service for which the Batch service requires outbound access.

domainName.description: The domain name of the dependency. Domain names may be fully qualified or may contain a * wildcard.

description.description: Human-readable supplemental information about the dependency and when it is applicable.

endpointDetails.description: The list of connection details for this endpoint.

EndpointDependency.description: A domain name and connection details used to access a dependency.

port.description: The port an endpoint is connected to.

EndpointDetail.description: Details about the connection between the Batch service and the endpoint.

MaxMonthlyVirtualUserHoursLimitRequest.description: Max monthly virtual usage hours limit request payload.

MaxMonthlyVirtualUserHoursResource.description: Max monthly virtual usage hours quota resource object.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

limit.description: Current quota limit of the quota bucket.

usage.description: Current quota usage of the quota bucket.
